item.title: Pressure Fueling System – Fueling Power Control Switch (Fueling Panel)

remarks.para: May be inoperative provided fueling panel is deactivated before each departure.

placard.para: Placard at refuel panel: "FUELING PWR CNTRL SW INOP". Enter item in Aircraft Deferred Item Log.

note.para: The repetitive inspection required when this item is inoperative must be documented in the Aircraft Logbook at the prescribed intervals. (Refer to GMM, Chapter 3, Section 6.)

numlitem.para: If the fueling power control switch (S681) has failed such that power cannot be removed from the refueling control panel, deactivate the panel following refueling as follows:
Position the refueling control panel power switch to NORM.
Open and collar the P414 panel FUELING PWR (or FUELING LTS) circuit breaker.
Verify that power has been removed from the refueling control panel.
Close the refueling control panel access door.
